title: A Form of Kindness
detail_text: <:th_ch0106/>Eli, take this.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Eh, a band-aid?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>You cut your fingertips earlier when you were flipping through the papers for the training plan, right? Geez, you need to be more careful.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>You saw that, huh. I didn’t think anyone would notice....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Heh, just who do you think I am? Nothing gets past Yohane. Come on, take it and be grateful.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Thank you. I’ll use it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>That’s right, no matter how small the wound is, it’ll be a problem if it gets infected, so go put it on right away. Ah, but before that, make sure you wash the wound first so germs won’t get in.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Yoshiko.... Fufu.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Wha-, don’t just pet my head suddenly like that! Also, it’s not Yoshiko, it’s Yohane!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Thanks for worrying about me, Yohane♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
